verses.verse: O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> that his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
Let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> that his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
Let them <S%H4994>now<s%> that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> that his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
I <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> in <S%H4712>distress:<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and set me in a <S%H4800>large<s%> place.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is on my side; I will not <S%H3372>fear:<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me?
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> takes my part with them that <S%H5826>help<s%> me: therefore shall I <S%H7200>see<s%> my desire on them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H120>man.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H5081>princes.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me about: but in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will I <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them.
They <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me about; <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me about: but in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> I will <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them.

They <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me about like <S%H1682>bees:<s%> they are <S%H1846>quenched<s%> as the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6975>thorns:<s%> for in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> I will <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them.
You have <S%H1760>thrust<s%> sore at me that I might <S%H5307>fall:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> me.
The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song,<s%> and is <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>rejoicing<s%> and <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is in the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
The <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7426>exalted:<s%> the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
I shall not <S%H4191>die,<s%> but <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> has <S%H3256>chastened<s%> me sore: but he has not <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H5414>over<s%> to <S%H4194>death.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> to me the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> I will <S%H935>go<s%> into them, and I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD:<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> into which the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H935>enter.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you: for you have <S%H6030>heard<s%> me, and are <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
The <S%H68>stone<s%> which the <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H3988>refused<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> stone of the <S%H6438>corner.<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1961>doing;<s%> it is <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in our <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6213>made;<s%> we will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8056>glad<s%> in it.
<S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> you, send <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H6743>prosperity.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be he that <S%H935>comes<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> we have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which has showed us <S%H216>light:<s%> <S%H631>bind<s%> the <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H5688>cords,<s%> even to the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
You are my <S%H410>God,<s%> and I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you: you are my <S%H430>God,<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> you.
O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good:<s%> for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
